snippet.title: POSTAL: Brain Damaged - 6/9 #Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
POSTAL: Brain Damaged on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359980/POSTAL_Brain_Damaged

Get ready to experience POSTAL from a brand-new perspective! This boomer-shooter spin-off of the fan-beloved Running With Scissors’ franchise will take you further down the rabbit hole than any previous game of the series. You’re not in Paradise anymore, and things are about to get weird, as POSTAL: Brain Damaged happens within the twisted psyche of the POSTAL DUDE, himself!

Make sure your body is ready to:

8=o Explore an all-new, hand-crafted world full of surprises

8=o Experience the challenging, fast-paced gameplay with quake-like movement and outrageous level design

8=o Take a trip through the rich, twisted, ever-changing environments of POSTAL DUDE’S deranged mind

8=o Shoot a variety of insane guns at some of the freakiest enemies to ever grace computer screens

8=o Follow the all-original story line making the POSTAL-VERSE continuity even more effed-up than it was

8=o Hear Corey Cruise returning as the POSTAL DUDE, with guest appearances from other fan-beloved voices

8=o Enjoy the POSTAL series trademark dark, crude humor and glorification of fantasy violence

POSTAL: Brain Damaged©️ Hyperstrange S.A., Running With Scissors Studios LLC, 1996-2021. All Rights Reserved.
POSTAL®️ Krotchy®️  and Running With Scissors®️ are Registered Trademarks and Service Marks of Running With Scissors Studios LLC.
Hyperstrange logo (c) Hyperstrange S.A.
